Articles.Content:
I discovered KSP a few months back and I love it!

I've built many failed rockets, landers, rovers, probes, stations etcetera but have been more sucessfull as of late. My last profile had six or so objects in orbit (okay, three were prebuilt ships from the KW Rocketry Mod but still). After the last update I have been experimenting like crazy, trying to build a working Lander/Skycrane/Rover Delivery system. After a few hours of tweaking I've come up with a basic yet effective lander, a nice rover and a somewhat finicky Skycrane.

I feel so stupid when seeing the complex things others have built

These are my milestones to date:

Succesfull Entry into space

Succesfull Orbit

Unmanned Probe in Orbit around Kerbin

Manned Ship in Orbit around Kerbin

Unmanned Probe in Orbit around Mun

Unmanned Probe in Orbit around Sun

Unmanned Probe landed on Mun

Manned Lander landed on Mun

I've essentially given up on Planes, at least until the KAS, Airships to Other Planets, Fire Spitter Propellers mods get updated for .20

Edited May 24, 2013 by F1refly
Adding Screenies
